name: Immigration Interview
description:
Immigration Horror Story is a game about how hard job interviews can be. Almost everyone must go through an interview during the adjustment of status process. In fact, there’s reason to get excited. The immigration interview is likely the last step in your application process. If all goes well, you’ll be a permanent resident (green card holder) at the end of the interview.

Note:

Although this game tries to represent real-life immigration interviews, I can't guarantee that all interviews look like in this game.

Credits:

Images by Unsplash
